item.title: [DISTRELEC-4645] R3 Feature: Provide data for punchOut filter on manufacturer
item.description:
Hi Evangelos
Could you please deliver us punchout data for testing?
item.summary: R3 Feature: Provide data for punchOut filter on manufacturer

comments.comment:
Hello Raphael,
I have sent a file from NEW SAP Q with the brand. Could you please check?

Hi Evangelos

As discussed, I need the data in a separate file named like this erp_punchoutfilt_man-

{yyyyMMddHHmmssSSS}

.csv

Hello Maciej,
We have added a new table in this file to export the files per Customer and Brand. Me and Ligia have updated our part but I think I didn't notify you to make your adjustments and have this exported as a separate file.
Could you please check the ticket?
Please check now, changes in PI have been transported to Q.

Hello Raphael,
Can you please check again
@Evangelos: No there is still no file. I have checked HP Q and also Atos Q. No files.

Hello Maciej,
I just run a file for this interface. Could you please let me know how many export files have PI created?

Hi Raphael,

please check if files made their way to FTP. There should be at least 3 correct types of files for country, customerType and customer. There should also be incorrect one for manufacturer. There is some problem with the last one which I am working on now. Please confirm that the rest is ok, thanks!
Fixed. Please check if files for all punch filters are in place. Thanks!

File is there and for a first look it looks fine.
I will test it in few minutes if everything works fine during the import, but I don't expect any issues.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-4357] R3 Feature: Bestseller Label
item.description:
Requirement

  • Initial Situation:
    • Bestseller info not available from movex, hence feature was not built
  • Requirement:
    • Receive info on bestseller products from SAP
    • Display respective promo label accordingly
  • Stakeholder:
    • Original webshop requirement
  • Discussion Points:
    • IF ready for this?
    • Spec needed?

IF description: https://wiki.namics.com/display/distrelint/IF-52+Bestseller+Status
Specification:

  • https://wiki.namics.com/display/distrelint/G121+Promotion+Labels
  • https://wiki.namics.com/display/distrelint/C28-ProductLabel

Next Steps
Specification
Estimate (initial provisional estimate of 0.5d added, may change)
Planning
Implementation

comments.comment:
As per Evangelos: feature has been developed in SAP side.
Needs implementation of DISTRELEC-2578 IF-52

Hi Nando,

Where can I find IF-52 if it is ready ?
I tried to take an update of wsdl for existing interface but I didn't find IF-52 over there so is it going to be a new wsdl/ end point for IF-52.
If yes, then please let me know the new end point, so that I can test this IF and start implementing these interfaces.

thanks

Hi Nando,

Could you please check with Evangelos , if IF-52 is ready on both PI & ERP ?

Thanks
Evangelos, could you please answer the question of Neeraj?

Hello Maciel,
Could you please let us know if IF-52 is developed from your side?
Yes, PI is ready.

Hi Maciej,

I took an updated wsdl from D pi system and did found the IF-52 there
Are you sure that you have published the latest wsdl from PI ?

Thanks

Hello Maciej,
Could you please check the last comment?

hi,

IF-52 was developed as asynchronous interfaces, hence it is not present in WSDL.
It works as other asynchronous interfaces: IF-01 to IF-05.
Thanks I got your point.
Ready for testing

Hi Neeraj
as discussed, could you please finalize the test of the best seller import with hotfolder.

After that we're ready for testing.

Hi Francesco,

I am done with the testing of hotfolder configuration and found it's working properly.

Note:- The testing as been done by keeping in mind that only once per day csv file will be generated and the generated file will have always a full export.

I 'll assign it to you further so that we can mark this task for ready for testing.

Thanks

item.title: [DISTRELEC-4718] Vouchers - nothing happens when a certain voucher code is given
item.description:
andre.hoffmann@distrelec.com
sap@distrelec

Kunder Nummer in SAP: 1241009

Free goods voucher: type of deal in SAP: 50
a voucher that applies to all customers: type of code: 00 (general)
validity timeframe: 01.08.2014 - 30.08.2014

Reusable code
Campaign number: KXtTRyK1yS
Material: 14021377
the campaign was: when someone buys 10 pieces, they become 2 for free.

when given in the webshop, nothing happends
item.summary: Vouchers - nothing happens when a certain voucher code is given

comments.comment:
with order calculation for that customer we receive from SAP the information that the voucher is not valid:

<vouchers>
	<code>KXtTRyK1yS</code>
	<fixedValue>0.0</fixedValue>
	<valid>false</valid>
</vouchers>

This situation is generating a 500 error.

I'm going to fix on hybris side and avoid to get a 500 error, but in SAP the voucher code is not valid.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-4678] DE // Billing Address not shown

item.title: [DISTRELEC-4358] R3 Feature: PunchOut Filter on Manufacturer Level
item.description:
Requirement

  • Initial Situation:
    • Various punchOut filters available, but not on manufacturer level
  • Requirement:
    • Possibility to block all products of a certain manufacturer for a certain customer
  • Stakeholder:
    • DE

Specification

  • Create a new IF to retrieve the punchout filters from SAP (add/see the IF spec here https://wiki.namics.com/display/distrelint/IF-05+PunchOut+Filters)
  • Create new data object in hybris to save the manufacturer punchout filters
  • Change the return logic of the punchout methods. At the moment there are two punchout methods:
    • The first method is just returning true/false
    • The second retuns the punchout filter object if there is a punchout
  • As the manufacturer punchout filter object does not include the product it self that is punched, like the other punchout filters, we have to change the return type of both methods
  • Return a new POJO that includes the product and the reason(s) for the punchout
  • Adjust the frontend to display proper messages to the customer why the selected product is not buyable for him
item.summary: R3 Feature: PunchOut Filter on Manufacturer Level

comments.comment:
As per Evangelos:

  • Manufacturers (Brand) are currently not part of IF-05
  • manufacturer mapping between sap and hybris necessary

Raphael,
please coordinate the tech spec and the implementation of the feature.

@Evangelos: How does the manufacturers look like in SAP? Can you give me an example? Probably PIM is already knowing the same code and we can match easily the manufacturer codes. Otherwise we have to find another useful matching mechanism.

If we are talking about new SAP it is an up to 10 digits field. Most of the articles have a 3 digit code which corresponds a vendor like APL, MEA, BRC, WEL etc. In some articles this code includes it can be a plant-customer meaning that create create the warehouse code 7370 as customer and it is 737000.

Hi Evangelos

I have updated the specification for the manufacturer punchout filters. You can find the spec here at the end of the page:
https://wiki.namics.com/display/distrelint/IF-05+PunchOut+Filters

What do you think, how long it will take to implement this file interface? Can you give me a date when we can get the first export?
If you have any other questions you can ask me until this evening, afterwards Adrian will take over this task.

Hello Maciej,
I have updated the FSP related to this ticket. This is related to the NEW SAP system. Please send over to Ligia as soon as this has been completed by you
PI part implemented on D. Ligia, please continue with ABAP part.

Hi Evangelos,

The ABAP part is implemented. You can test in D10 and confirm the transport to Q10 if all is ok.

Best Regards,
Ligia

Data should be provided by the business.
--> Evangelos, could you please add some fake data for the tests
Any news here?

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3524] Improve loading of similar products and accessories
item.description:
The load time of some product detail pages are very bad.
The reason is: This products have many similar products or accessories, or both.
The loading of the similar products and accessories needs an improvement.
A solution could be:

  • Load the first 3 products during the loading of the product detail page it self. If somebody clicks on the similar products or accessories tab, the first 3 products will be shown and in the background the next 10 products get loaded. If the user clicks than on "Show more" the 10 products loaded before can be shown directly and the next 10 get loaded in the background. So we always have 10 products that can be shown directly and the next 10 get loaded in the background. That is nice in point of user experience, because there is no waiting time and it is nice in point of performance. (Loading of 10 products is not so expensive)
item.summary: Improve loading of similar products and accessories

comments.comment:
Note:
Similar products and accessories initially only show 3 products, but on "show more" 10 more are loaded.
So only the first 3 need to be loaded on pageload.
Here a list of product references
Updated description to the recommendation of Nando

I updated the code and the current behaviour is the following:

  • At product page loading, we load only the first 3 similar/accessory products.
  • When the user clicks on the similar/accessories tab, he will see only these 3 items.
  • The next 10 items will be loaded only if the user clicks on the show more button.
Fixed (checkin in trunk)
